description: This Dart file defines a customizable search bar widget for a Flutter app, featuring a rounded container with an embedded search input, clear button, and a gradient submit button. It is intended for use within a Flutter mobile application.

classes.name: AppSearchBar
classes.description: A StatefulWidget providing a rounded search bar with icon, clear button, and gradient submit button.

classes.name: _AppSearchBarState
classes.description: State class managing internal logic, focus, and interactions for the AppSearchBar widget.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the search input and triggers the onChanged callback with an empty string.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Triggers the onSubmit callback with the current trimmed input text.
